code: import{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Countdown(_ref){let{targetDate}=_ref;const[timeLeft,setTimeLeft]=useState({});useEffect(()=>{const interval=setInterval(()=>{const diff=new Date(targetDate)-new Date();const days=Math.floor(diff/(1000*60*60*24));const hours=Math.floor(diff/(1000*60*60)%24);const minutes=Math.floor(diff/(1000*60)%60);const seconds=Math.floor(diff/1000%60);setTimeLeft({days,hours,minutes,seconds});},1000);return()=>clearInterval(interval);},[targetDate]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-4 text-xl sm:text-3xl md:text-5xl text-white",style:{fontFamily:"'Playfair Display', sans-serif"},children:[timeLeft.days,"j ",timeLeft.hours,"h ",timeLeft.minutes,"m ",timeLeft.seconds,"s"]});}export default Countdown;
